title: 111_s3985
content: The Emergency Senior Citizens Relief Act of 2010 may be cited as the Act. It extends and modifies certain economic recovery payments. Extension and Modification of Payments under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009, amending subsection (a)(1)(A) for calendar years 2009 and 2011. Individual eligibility for payments tied to specific benefit entitlements. The text chunk discusses eligibility criteria for payments under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 for calendar years 2009 and 2011. It specifies that individuals must have received a benefit described in subparagraph (B)(i) in the 12-month period ending with December 2010 to qualify for payments in 2011. Additionally, it mentions criteria for individuals utilizing specific postal addresses. The text chunk details amendments to subsections regarding payment eligibility criteria under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 for calendar years 2009 and 2011. It includes changes related to the address of record and the frequency of payments per calendar year. The text chunk amends payment eligibility criteria under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 for calendar years 2009 and 2011, specifically addressing individuals entitled to certain benefits under the Social Security Act. The text chunk modifies payment eligibility criteria for individuals entitled to benefits under the Social Security Act for calendar years 2009 and 2011. The text chunk modifies payment eligibility criteria for individuals entitled to benefits under the Social Security Act for calendar years 2009 and 2011. It includes provisions related to the date of death of the individual and the timing of payment negotiation or deposit. The text chunk amends payment eligibility criteria for individuals receiving benefits under the Social Security Act for calendar years 2009 and 2011, specifying conditions related to payment reissuance and certification dates. The text chunk modifies payment eligibility criteria for individuals receiving benefits under the Social Security Act for calendar years 2009 and 2011, setting deadlines for payment disbursement and certification. The text chunk modifies payment eligibility criteria for individuals receiving benefits under the Social Security Act for calendar years 2009 and 2011, setting deadlines for payment disbursement and certification. Certification for payment under this section is affected by an individual's status described in specific subparagraphs of subsection (a)(4), with restrictions on certification if previously denied for payment by certain subparagraphs. Subsection (c) is amended to address payments subject to offset and reclamation. The text chunk addresses payments subject to offset and reclamation, specifying that payments made under this section are subject to reclamation provisions and are not considered benefit payments for certain purposes. The text chunk specifies additional funding allocations for the Secretary of the Treasury, Commissioner of Social Security, and Railroad Retirement Board for specific purposes. The text chunk allocates $600,000 for paragraph (3)(B) purposes and an additional $625,000 for the Information Systems Technology account for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. Additionally, it extends a special credit for certain government retirees for the first taxable year beginning in 2011. The amendments made by this section will take effect on the date of the enactment of the Act, with a specific rule applying to deceased individuals.
